actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA, OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to revise the formula for the payment of dependency and indemnity compensation (DIC) to the surviving spouses of veterans who die on active duty or from service-connected disability.
short_title: Dependency and Indemnity Compensation Reform Act of 1985

summary.text: Dependency and Indemnity Compensation Reform Act of 1985 - Revises the formula for the payment of dependency and indemnity compensation (DIC) to the surviving spouses of veterans who die on active duty. Adds a formula for postservice DIC based on the percentage of service-connected disability (at time of death) of the person upon whose death entitlement is predicated. Adds a formula of inservice DIC based upon the amount of active duty by the person now deceased. Provides for the election of the revised DIC type for those persons awarded DIC effective before December 1, 1985.
